sourcesContent:
import { Modal, ModalOverlay, ModalContent, ModalBody, ModalCloseButton, Button, useDisclosure, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import star from "../../assets/star.svg"; import './index.css'; export default function Detail({ movie}) { const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure(); const { id, rank, title, genres, description, ratings, year, imdb_id, imdb_url, image_url, director, writer, duration, age_certification, } = movie; const formattedGenres = genres.replace(/\[|\]|'/g, '').replace(/\s*,\s*/g, ','); return ( <>
Rank: {rank}
{ratings}
{title}

Imdb_id: {imdb_id}

Year: {year}
Genre: {formattedGenres}
Description: {description}
Director: {director}
Writer: {writer}
Duration: {duration} min
Age Certification: {age_certification}
Imdb_url: {imdb_url}
); }
